summary: Paulo Coelho , is a Brazilian lyricist and novelist.
full_text: Paulo Coelho , is a Brazilian lyricist and novelist. He is the recipient of numerous international awards, amongst them the Crystal Award by the World Economic Forum. The Alchemist, his most famous novel, has been translated into 80 languages. The author has sold 210 million copies worldwide  and is the all-time bestselling Portuguese language author  .
title: Paulo Coelho
